projects.title: Ja\m/ing
projects.description: Jammming was a Codecademy.com tutorial project to build an app for creating, and saving Spotify playlists. Codecademy supplied  the original front end design/layout. As it was designed there were some UI/UX & accessibility flaws. This design fixes some of these issues.

projects.title: Advice generator app
projects.description: A Frontend Mentor project for learning how to interact with 3rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

projects.title: NFT preview card component
projects.description: A Frontend Mentor challenge for HTML/CSS/Sass.

projects.title: Interactive rating component
projects.description: A Frontend Mentor project to practice handling user interactions and updating the DOM.

projects.title: Random Password Generator
projects.description: Udemy Angular tutorial, that I then expanded on to add additional features.

projects.title: TCA Cribbage App
projects.type: React Project for Advanced Frontend Class
projects.description: Cribbage stats tracking app created as a project for my Advanced Front End Development class (Spring 2022).
